Cascading Style Sheets

A nested tag is a tag that wxists inside another tag. Some tags require nesting while others shouldn't be nested.

An atribute is further instructions for the computer given inside of the opening tag. Such as the id we gave our div OR the charset we used inside of the meta tag.

Lists are just like lists made in real life. They requrie nesting li tags inside of other tags.
